title: Implement End-to-End Testing and CI/CD
description: Create comprehensive test suite and GitHub Actions workflow for continuous integration. Test all scripts with focus on task breakdown scenarios, subtask creation, and parent completion logic.
notes: Test coverage: Unit tests for each script function, Integration tests for workflows, E2E tests for complete scenarios (including complex breakdown operations), Performance benchmarks. GitHub Actions for automated testing on push/PR.
decision_rationale: Comprehensive testing ensures reliability and prevents regressions. CI/CD automation maintains quality as system evolves.
